page.title: 02A TEACHER LIVING IN CRADLEY
page.content: She comes from a Welsh family. She lives in Cradley in a modern brick house with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.Living with her are her mother and mother-in-law,both widows. Her husband is Second Master at the John Masefield Comprehensive School in Ledbury and her 22 year old son works for an oil company.She teaches at Bosbury School.Her interests are gardening and singing with the Cradley Singers.Since she has lived here Cradley has been built up a lot with new housing estates.She doesn't like driving around Cradley because of the sharp bends and narrow lanes.Her favourite programmes are documentaries and thrillers.In her opinion children are the same as they have always been but the fashions suit children more.
